email.subject: Update: Round 5 Information
email.body:
Okay #PLAYERNAME#, Round 4 consisted of a battle between hackers 'Curs3' and '5plinter', and I have to say, '5plinter' wiped the floor with 'Curs3.'
You're up next again, final 1v1 match, with Round 5 being matched with you versus 'Curs3.' He's feeling pretty salty after the loss on that last round so I wouldn't expect him to be going easy on you! Watch out for him!
You've got a firewall to deal with this time, so watch out for that. It shouldn't take too long to get through it but the trace time is pretty quick, so you'd better get those Port Crackers running first.
When you're ready, go pick up the contract on the Battleboard.
- Eleanor Hammond
Hacker Wars Assistant assigned to: #PLAYERNAME#
